import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState}from"react";//import fotos from '../../Store/StoreDatas.json';
import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../../Styles/fotografias.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Fotografias=()=>{const carousel=useRef(null);const[images,setImages]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:8000/components/fotografias.php",{method:"GET"});if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();setImages(data);}else{console.error("Erro: "+response.status);}};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"FOTOGRAFIAS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-foto",ref:carousel,children:images.map((image,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"card-foto",src:"../components/uploadsFotos/".concat(image.foto),alt:image.data_hora}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"name",children:[" ",image.nome]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{target:"_blank",to:"/imagem/".concat(image.id),children:"Saber mais"})]})]},index);})})]});};export default Fotografias;
